cs.DM, cs.FL, cs.IT, cs.LO, cs.SY. 

The paper deals with the synchronization of automata, which is a topic in discrete mathematics (cs.DM). The concept of almost-group automata is related to group theory, which is also a topic in discrete mathematics. The paper also involves probability theory, which is a topic in information theory (cs.IT) and theoretical computer science (cs.FL). The paper's focus on synchronization and strongly connected automata suggests that it may also be relevant to the study of formal languages (cs.LO). Finally, the paper's use of automata and probability suggests that it may be relevant to the study of control systems (cs.SY).
